code: import axios from"axios";import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Navigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SingBlog=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[blog,setBlog]=useState({});const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchsingblog=async()=>{const res=await axios.get("http://localhost:9000/api/v1/get/blog/".concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem("token"))}});setBlog(res.data);};fetchsingblog();},[id]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container shadow my-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-12 d-flex items-center justify-content-center bg-light",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"my-3",children:blog.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"http://localhost:9000/".concat(blog.thumbnail),className:"img img-responsive img-rounded my-3",alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"my-3",children:blog.description})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate("/"),className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Back to the Post"})]})});};export default SingBlog;
